dct_title_s: Map of the countries mentioned in the Bible
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, places of historical interest, settlement areas of the descendants of the tribes of Israel.
4 inset maps: The world showing the portion known to the Hebrews thus -- The world as peopled by the descendants of Noah -- Supposed situation of paradise -- Map of Sheba, Ophir &c.
